ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Create a status update on an incident
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Create a status update on an incident
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Create a new status update for the specified incident.
An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Create a status update on an incident

Create a new status update for the specified incident. An incident represents a problem or an issue that needs to be addressed and resolved. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#incidents)

Method: Post

OperationID: createIncidentStatusUpdate

EndPoint:

/incidents/{id}/status_updates
